message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a unique opportunity to acquire something truly exceptional. I believe its value goes beyond $12000, but I understand everyone has different perspectives on valuation. To start our discussion, I propose a price of $15000 for the product.

I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I'm looking to stay within a tighter budget. I'm willing to consider a price of $12000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you've described.
